automaticStopTimeMinutes.description: The number of minutes until the running instance is shut down after the environment has last been used.

connectionType.description: The connection type used for connecting to an Amazon EC2 environment. Valid values are `CONNECT_SSH` and `CONNECT_SSM`. For more information please refer [AWS documentation for Cloud9](https://docs.aws.amazon.com/cloud9/latest/user-guide/ec2-ssm.html).

imageId.description:
The identifier for the Amazon Machine Image (AMI) that's used to create the EC2 instance. Valid values are
* `amazonlinux-1-x86_64`
* `amazonlinux-2-x86_64`
* `ubuntu-18.04-x86_64`
* `ubuntu-22.04-x86_64`
* `resolve:ssm:/aws/service/cloud9/amis/amazonlinux-1-x86_64`
* `resolve:ssm:/aws/service/cloud9/amis/amazonlinux-2-x86_64`
* `resolve:ssm:/aws/service/cloud9/amis/ubuntu-18.04-x86_64`
* `resolve:ssm:/aws/service/cloud9/amis/ubuntu-22.04-x86_64`

instanceType.description: The type of instance to connect to the environment, e.g., `t2.micro`.

ownerArn.description: The ARN of the environment owner. This can be ARN of any AWS IAM principal. Defaults to the environment's creator.

subnetId.description: The ID of the subnet in Amazon VPC that AWS Cloud9 will use to communicate with the Amazon EC2 instance.

tags.description: Key-value map of resource tags. .If configured with a provider `default_tags` configuration block present, tags with matching keys will overwrite those defined at the provider-level.

tagsAll.description: A map of tags assigned to the resource, including those inherited from the provider `default_tags` configuration block.

type.description: The type of the environment (e.g., `ssh` or `ec2`)

automaticStopTimeMinutes.description: The number of minutes until the running instance is shut down after the environment has last been used.

connectionType.description: The connection type used for connecting to an Amazon EC2 environment. Valid values are `CONNECT_SSH` and `CONNECT_SSM`. For more information please refer [AWS documentation for Cloud9](https://docs.aws.amazon.com/cloud9/latest/user-guide/ec2-ssm.html).

* `ubuntu-18.04-x86_64`
* `ubuntu-22.04-x86_64`
* `resolve:ssm:/aws/service/cloud9/amis/amazonlinux-1-x86_64`
* `resolve:ssm:/aws/service/cloud9/amis/amazonlinux-2-x86_64`
* `resolve:ssm:/aws/service/cloud9/amis/ubuntu-18.04-x86_64`
* `resolve:ssm:/aws/service/cloud9/amis/ubuntu-22.04-x86_64`
